
Subject: Your VPS has expired

Hello %%%FIRST_NAME%%%,

Your Xen Virtual Server (VPS) %%%VPS_NUMBER%%%:%%%VPS_NODE%%%
has expired %%%EXPIRED_DAYS%%% days ago, on the: %%%EXPIRATION_DATE%%%.

Please login into your control panel at

%%%DTC_CLIENT_URL%%%

with your login %%%DTC_ADM_LOGIN%%%, click on your VPS tab, and
renew it.

We will keep your VPS up few days to give you the time to renew your
contract.

%%%SIGNATURE%%%
